text: Ta'ika koraa ha’la, ‘prasadatora bhitarata praraesa karaa’. Eteke yetiya ta'i se'ito dekhile tetiya ta'i se'itoka jalasaya buli bhabile arau duyo bharaira kapora kalaphulilaike anabrta karaile. Te'om (chula'imane) ka’le, ‘eya kacerae nirmita sbaccha prasadahe’. Mahila garaakiye (praarthana karai) ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Niscaya ma'i nijara prati an'yaya karaichilo, arau ma'i etiya chula'imanara lagata srstijagatara raba allahara prati atmasamarpana karailo’
